channel.title: EasyRSC - weapon editing
channel.description:
need help with weapon editing.. i tryed to edit an iron mace into a Light Saber, i edited both the itemdefs.xml and the itemwiedable.xml however when i login into my server it comes up still as iron mace, however in my control panel its viewed as LightSaber(s) but the stats are changed to 95aim and power which is what i wanted, but it still looks like an iron mace in my inventory and when i wield it its basically invisible and my amulet goes white.
Im thinking the problem lies within the sprites, i was trying to make it look like a bronze long.
Any tips on where im going wrong? Thanks in advance.

item.title: EasyRSC - weapon editing
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

FUCK! Your an retard. Do you have a brain? serious do you?

You have to add it in conf/def/extras/itemwieldable.xml and conf/def/itemDef.xml (and the client) Conf/item.rscd and amination.rscd

Try uses your so called brain or go shot yourself!
xml edit is the easiest thing here on rsc, if you ask many question about it you will the new noob noone helpes couse he won’t give 5 min of hes life learning something that simple!

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC - weapon editing
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Yes, you need picture from all angles. It will roughly be 18 images or so.

Look what the others are saved as and go up in number.

If you can’t figure it out from here, i’d suggest just leaving it. Sprites are seriously annoying.

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC - weapon editing
item.dc:creator: @HM11 HM
item.description:
@HM11 wrote:

yong min:

You need animated sprite images if you want to wield the weapon. Look at how the other sprites for weapons are constructed in the sprites.rscd.

ok So i have my image, do i need to make more images of it from different angles or what? I don’t understand what you’re trying to say, I’ve looked at the folder and most weapons aren’t in there like r2h and stuff.

If I gotta make different angles, what do i save them as? and how will my itemdefwieldable.xml know that there is more angles if i can only write 1 sprite?

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC - weapon editing
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

You need animated sprite images if you want to wield the weapon. Look at how the other sprites for weapons are constructed in the sprites.rscd.

item.title: EasyRSC - weapon editing
item.dc:creator: @HM11 HM
item.description:
@HM11 wrote:

yong min:

Sort out the animated sprites and change it in the ItemWieldableDef.xml[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2009, 04:29:17 am[/size][hr]And of course, Animations.rscd

I don’t get what you mean, can you give me in steps please

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC - weapon editing
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Sort out the animated sprites and change it in the ItemWieldableDef.xml[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2009, 04:29:17 am[/size][hr]And of course, Animations.rscd

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC - weapon editing
item.dc:creator: @HM11 HM
item.description:
@HM11 wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:6, topic:305154”][quote author=HM link=topic=401412.msg2975099#msg2975099 date=1254235456]

you will need a sprite editor im messin up on my server too lol im changing colour if a npc and now its not working but of well

I got everything, I packed the sprite but in game it won’t show it.
[/quote]

Do you mean it isn’t showing the sprite in inventory image?

If so, take the number of your sprite (for new image), and minus 2150 from it. That will give you the number to use for the sprite in ItemsDef.xml and Items.rscd.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2009, 08:51:10 am[/size][hr]For example: if you have a sprite image you want to use in the inventory that is 2590 for example, the sprite number you would add to ItemsDef.xml and Items.rscd is 440.

Hope this makes sense.[/quote]
Ok I done this but now when I try to run my client I get an error and gives me 5 different solutions and in the .bat it says missing sprite
2589.

EDIT: I’ve just made a copy of the same sprite but named it 2589 and it worked, I logged on and the inventory image was the one I wanted. But how do I make it so that When he wears it, it’s the same. Because when he wears it right now it’s a black skirt. Any help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2009, 09:36:30 pm[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC - weapon editing
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“HM, post:5, topic:305154”][quote author=samanthapk link=topic=401412.msg2975090#msg2975090 date=1254235007]
you will need a sprite editor im messin up on my server too lol im changing colour if a npc and now its not working but of well
[/quote]
I got everything, I packed the sprite but in game it won’t show it.[/quote]

Do you mean it isn’t showing the sprite in inventory image?

If so, take the number of your sprite (for new image), and minus 2150 from it. That will give you the number to use for the sprite in ItemsDef.xml and Items.rscd.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2009, 08:51:10 am[/size][hr]For example: if you have a sprite image you want to use in the inventory that is 2590 for example, the sprite number you would add to ItemsDef.xml and Items.rscd is 440.

Hope this makes sense.

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC - weapon editing
item.dc:creator: @HM11 HM
item.description:
@HM11 wrote:

yong min:

Edit the Items.rscd file client side.

I have edited that, but the problem is with my sprites. I don’t know what sprite number to put in. I can change names and examine description but not the image.

Read full topic
